headline: Weaviate named a Leader and Outperformer by GigaOm and Emerging Leader by Gartner; Market Momentum Accelerates as Nonrelational DBMS Segment Grows 22.7%
summary: Rapid delivery of new features positions Weaviate at the forefront of a booming market driven by enterprise adoption of generative AI. Weaviate Weaviate Amsterdam City, Jan. 13, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Weaviate, the AI database company, today announced it has been recognized as a Leader and Outperformer in the 2025 GigaOm Radar for Vector Databases. This recognition highlights Weaviate’s advanced capabilities in multimodality and agentic AI at a time when the broader database market is undergoi
